fields.name: ***National Security Inquiry** (1x, Charge 130%)*:
fields.value: The night after using this ability, you will learn two of the following facts about your target: Whether they have attack power 0.5x or greater, whether they have mainly visited Town or non-Town players or neither, or their most recently used ability's primary function (killing, investigative/deceptive, supportive/protective, roleblocking/interference).

fields.name: ***Undercover Investigation** (1x, Charge 190%)*:
fields.value:
Two nights after using this ability, you will learn three of the following facts about your target: Their exact score the first night, their exact score the second night, who they visited the first night, who they visited the second night, or their role's defense power (+/- 0.2).

***Plainclothes** (Passive)*
While waiting for the result of an Undercover Investigation, your defense power is reduced by 0.2x. Additionally, any investigative abilities targeting you will be incorrect.

fields.name: ***intelligence Report*** (passive):
fields.value: At the start of N2, you are made aware of every alignment/subalignment present in the game (resembling a traditional rolelist).
